MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut in the EH20 postcode area of Loanhead affecting properties in Mayburn Vale and surrounding streets. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut however our engineers have now arrived on site and need to carry out repairs on a faulty underground cable on Mayburn Walk, we now need to carry out an emergency shutdown at 12.30pm. This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12.29pm on Monday 19th October 2020.
